function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for contamination of IEQ concentrators and monitoring system due to physical interaction with multiple users","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases among users and risk of cross-contamination","Mitigation":"Implementing touchless interfaces, regular disinfection protocols, and promoting proper hygiene practices","Technologies":"Touchless sensors, self-cleaning surfaces, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Users, maintenance staff, building occupants","Owner":"Building management, facilities maintenance team"},{"Description":"Lack of cloud connectivity may limit the ability to detect and respond to contagious disease outbreaks in real-time","Impact":"Delay in identifying and responding to disease outbreaks, increased risk of widespread transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing redundant communication systems, leveraging edge computing for real-time analysis, and establishing local outbreak response protocols","Technologies":"Edge computing devices, redundant communication networks, local outbreak detection algorithms","People":"Public health authorities, building management, local community","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owner, local community leaders"},{"Description":"Storage of data in text files may pose a security risk, leading to unauthorized access and potential data breaches","Impact":"Compromise of sensitive health and environmental data, risk of privacy violations","Mitigation":"Implementing data encryption, access control measures, and regular security audits","Technologies":"Data encryption algorithms, access control systems, security audit tools","People":"Data administrators, IT personnel, building management","Owner":"Data administrators, building management"}]}
